message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.IR 

This paper deals with natural language processing (NLP) tasks such as sentiment classification and sarcasm detection. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also uses deep neural networks, which suggests that it could belong to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) or cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper deals with improving the performance of both tasks, which could fall under cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). Finally, the paper also deals with text classification, which could fall under cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
